text: It is so unfortunate about  how ladies treat men's heart these days
My cat spit up a hairball in my shoes today. I was so peeved!
I really thought the new Star Wars movies would better but they are not. They are so aweful!
Anytime I see a mall, I get nostalgic about all the times going there to play in the arcade.  Good Ole' Days.
I got a bad mark on my math test. I should have studied harder.
I was waiting for nearly 2 entire months for the results of a test that I prepared for a long time to take.
When I was in high school, a few classmates and I cheated on a math test. I regret that too this day.
My friend graduated valedictorian while working full-time during his junior and senior year.
I felt proud when I had accomplished a dream that I wanted to do for a long time.
Went to the rec center today after work, and it was closed. They didn't announce it or anything
I sure am glad that we live in a free country.
I do not like the fact my brother always uses my car.
I was going to be meeting with the Pres of the USA.  I knew going into the meeting what I wanted to tell him about my denuclearization
I'm trying to be more careful with my money these days.
i was in a competition,tomorrow is the elimination stage
I feel so wonderful and blessed to have an amazing girlfriend. She is very understanding, like one time i was sick and she made me soup from scratch and a tea to help my throat.
I took my co-workers phone charger and brought it home with me. I am planning on keeping it
The weatherman said that we would have a snow event so I was ready.
I was so sad the other day but my friend cheered me up.  I am so thankful for him.
MY daughter cannot follow simple directions because she is glued to her phone
I let someone borrow a $230 tool and had to trust them to bring it back.
I listened to some old music I used to listen to recently. It literally made me feel like I was reliving the past!
im going to a concert on sunday, i am thinking its going to be good
I get aggravated when my daughters have too much homework.\
I am sitting here and there is a gigantic storm a brewing!
It was a happy weekend. I got to go kayaking with friends
Super excited about some moisturizer I am getting tomorrow. It seems like I can't ever find the right one for my skin so I am hoping this works.
Tesla's new autopilot drove autonomously for 4 miles
A co-worker of my husband asked me out on a date. I think that was rude and i told him no.
I've got some big medical tests coming up.  I wish they would have done them that day, but I have to wait now.
Manager schedueled me for an entire week of shifts, many of them doubles and without much time for a break between.
I am happy today I can feed my birds and get everything I need and there is no drama.
I just found out I am moving to a larger office at work. I was very shocked.
i felt bad when i couldnt get a gift my daughter wanted
I was shocked that the Eagles won the superbowl last year, really caught me off guard
I broke my mothers favorite vase and blamed it on my cat. I was only 10 years old.
I won the MVP award at a hockey tournament. I had 8 goals.
I was unable to help my friend who's in need. But I tried my level best to help her to solve the issue. She understand and get the issue solved through our another colleague.
Honestly, I am, for the most part, scared of the dark.  I think it is from all the scary movies I watched when I was a kid.
I was playing baseball in my backyard with my friends and when I hit the ball it flew over my fence and I heard a window get smashed.
I was planning a vacation soon, but due to an emergency at work, all vacation time was cancelled.
I forgot my best friend's birthday this year. I've known him forever and am usually great about remebering and doing special thigns.
Next month we are finally taking a family vacation. It's been so long, it seems!
I went shopping today and tried on a cute dress. I walked out to look in the big mirror and the dress wasn't pulled down all the way.
Bleh, I just had the worst food ever. I almost puked after I ate the rotten cheese burger I was given at McDonalds.
It was really dark and rainy one time when we were driving. We also crashed and it scared the hell outta me.
My girlfriend wants me to go to Thanksgiving at her parents this year, but I haven't even met them yet.
What does it take to not ever have someone in one's life
I just feel for an email scam. I am so gulible and they are getting really good at stealing my money
i knew i shouldnt have trusted my brother with my dog
My friend is having a baby. I don't know what a nice gift to get her would be.
My boyfriend can sing really well but I can't
I can't wait to get out of these work clothes and into my sweats
i am sure the braves will contend for the title this year!
I watched Spice World yesterday.  I couldn't help but think about all of the fun times I had in junior high school watching that movie repeatedly
when i found out that my daughter had a bad reaction to her shot. it was scary
I went camping the other week, and I was so happy to not have to worry about the troubles of the world for a while. It was therapeutic, honestly.
I am so sick of cleaning up after everyone. I cleaned the whole house last week and no one will even help keep it that way by at least cleaning up after themselves.
My kids are getting so big, They aren't my litlle babies anymore
I owe some guys some money after playing a poker game. They know where I live and I see them driving by late at night.
I'm going to ask this girl I've been talking online with for a while out on a date.
Ordered some pho, and the delivery guy gave me pizza, too.
I feel so guilty.  I cheated on my husband.
Broke up with my girlfriend last week. I don't have anyone to do stuff with anymore.
Up extra early today, I couldn't sleep. I am starting a new job today.
My son is being bullied in school and no one is doing anything about it.
I am very happy to be an American.
I have been studying a month for a test and I am ready to knock it out of the park.
My dog threw-up all over my bed. I can't believe it.
I was once given a watch and I got the opportunity to make a lot of money off it, but I kept it for it's emotional value.
I moved far away from the city. I hardly ever see my friends anymore.
I'm texting 2 girls right now, one 18 and one 24 both smart and super attractive.  I'm curious to see who I'll end up dating first
We used some of the money we'd set aside for my son's college to fix our hot water heater.  We're trying to repay it monthly til it's replenished.
I took the bus without paying for it. I feel bad afterward.
My friend and I had planned to go hiking last Sunday morning. I overslept and the whole plan blew out. So disappointed in myself
As I attend all the graduations over the summer for family, I can't help to think back to my graduation.
Before I met my girlfriend I felt lonely very often, I am glad that is better now
I never get to go out and see people.
My dog is 16 years old. He is starting to have health problems.
I heard a noise outside my window! I hope nobody is out there waiting to kill me!
My friends left to dinner without me since I canceled last minute.
I took out the trash this morning. The trash bag ripped open and made a mess, I didn't clean it up. I felt so bad.
I just got a new car. I parked it in front of my house. Right away some neighborhood teens came around and keyed it. Now I have to get it fixed.
I've a business meeting tomorrow. I'm looking forward to it. Hope I'll do my best.
I need to replace the engine in my car.  I am sure I can do it.
My husband's been out of town this week, and will be gone for another week.  It's so quiet around the house, I can't get used to it.
Everything is alright these days
I got an extra 2 days paid time off from work.
My parents planned a welcoming party for me.
I was embarrassed when I fell at school.
My cat has to be put down next week. She has been very sick for a month and not improving.
i was suprised when i saw this guy dunk the other ball the other day
My friend used to not be very active. Now she does triathlons!
MY new neighbors have people coming in and out at all times of the night
My social anxiety acted up and I failed at doing basic math in my head when paying the cashier and looked like an idiot!
I am going back to school. I never thought I would. I can't wait
If I'm going on a date with a really attractive girl I sometimes feel more ready if I have a drink beforehand.
I made a brilliant pizza the other day
I was afraid during the earthquake.
I am upset the Eagles lost yesterday, they lost to the worst team in the league, and got shutout
I slipped while carrying a tray of coffee. I got it all over myself.
My friend invited me on a cruise but I wasn't sure about it because I get seasick easily.
My cat vomited on my shoes the other day
I went to six flags last year and got on a roller coaster for the first time. And when it stated I was ok but as went on I was scared to death.
My daughter said her first word yesterday. I was so filled with pride.
When i was younger i wanted a new computer so bad. I didn't have good parts and the computer was so slow. When i got the new computer i was ecstatic.
There's 2 escaped convicts loose in my town! They were last seen in my neighborhood!
I just got cable and ther is seriously nothing on any of these 600 channels
My nephew dropped his ice cream on the ground and started crying. His older brother gave him his ice cream.
I asked my friend to get some stuff for a party, I knew I could count on him though.
I saw a guy scratching his behind on the train this morning.
Everytime my friend comes over and brings his kids, he never keeps a close eye on them and they ravage my place!
I am grateful for my life right now, I have a girlfriend, a good job, and a good group of friends
My manager has taken my coworker for a work trip to New York. I was also suppose to go with them.
I am looking forward to tomorrow. I think church will be good for me
i'm so mad at my sister because she always talks bad things about me behind my back
I recently saw someone eat a week old tuna sandwich.  I wanted to throw up.
I was furious when my mom was gossipped about.
On my drive home from work I noticed there were a lot of dark clouds rolling in. Usually this means there will be a lot of rain. I anticipated thunderstorms and was right.
I was forced to give a speech in front of a large and completly full auditorium. I had barley any time to prepare and really had no idea what I was supposed to say.

My brother had to go out of town with his family to a funeral lst month.He asked me to take care of his house plant for him and I said yes, but after he left I got so caught up in myself i forgot to water his plants and they all died.
I was very positively suprissed by the work done by a coworker.
I am going wakeboarding this weekend for the 5th time this summer!  I am really good at it and can do some flawless jumps!  I wonder if I should go pro!
I once trsuted my dog to not run off. he is a good boy.
I know I will win my court case.
I was pretty surprised that my friend was able to step his money game up last week.  I was pretty proud of him
Someone threw a pretzel at me at the baseball game.  I was so mad at that guy.
i get frustrated when i let someone out in traffic and dont get a wave
I felt successful when I received an internship offer last year. I know I beat out some other candidates!
My best friend just got a girlfriend who is smoking hot. I wish I could find a girl like that. I don't know how he did it.
My car gets me where i need to go.
I lost my Grandpa 2 months ago.  He died within a week all of a sudden and I miss him every day.
I can't believe they threw me a party for my birthday!

Watching someone stream an old video game on Twitch, one that I used to play. It's one that's like almost 20 years old, that I used to play when I was 11. Makes me wish I didn't have so many bills and responsibilities!
I ordered McDonalds yesterday and since my lazy daughter wouldn't get out of bed I ate her food. I kind of fell bad about it.
I saw a homeless man sleeping near Walmart when i came out after shopping. It was so sad to see him in such situation
I came home from grocery shopping to find that my husband had cleaned the entire house up and started dinner.  I was amazed.
I was supposed to go to Busch Gardens last weekend , but it was raining and we had to cancel.
My friend is coming in from out of town today.
I saw a snake outside my apartment today
a situation where i felt that way would be when i graduated school
I walked into my physics exam after studying for it for days. I was so hyped that I was gonna get an A on it.
I am a first generation Filipino.  I am Maharlika, a warrior class meaning "Chosen by God" and I'm one of the last of my kind.  I've got royal blood running through my veins
On my first crazy roller coaster.
i was excited when i got to leave work early
I was just accused from my wife that I stole $10 from her Purse. I am so furious right now, I would never do that

Was playing rough with my relatives, running around outside, doing touch football. I think I twisted my ankle or something. I'm dumb and don't have health insurance this year.. Worried how much money I'm gonna have to spend
I got spayed in the face with wound juices
I ordered a half pound of turley and the lady at the deli gave me roast beef. I didn't notice until we got home. It was terrible
I felt embarrassed when I went in too the store with my clothes dirty
